alert.note: Alert for Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 8:45AM MST until January 05 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. 2 to 5 inches southern Utah County including cities such as Santaquin, Elk Ridge, and Woodland Hills. Trace to 3 inches for the remainder of Utah County. * WHERE...Utah Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Occasional winter driving conditions are possible through Utah County, with the heaviest impacts south of Provo.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
